Teamname: Brocode

project: Find the best 5 solutions to your question at StackOverflow, because at StackOverflow 
                    platform , million or billion number of questions and solutions are available. 
                 To optimize the best 5 solutions, our project is based on this problem. our Machine learning 
                    model fetching the data from StackOverflow and optimize to collect 5 best solution. 
                 We have also developed User-interface for this project. you can enter any question and get best 
                    related 5 solutions.

Tech-Stack: Machine Learning using Python.
                          User-interface using python.

Web auction is an online platform where you can upload your product and also you can bid any product.

functionality : 
        1.  Log in/Register  page
        2.  Home page, where all products will be displayed with photo, title, amount, and more info.
        3. You can also add your product after login with timer.
        4. when click to bid button it will show details of product such as timer, who have bided and many 
              more.
        5. There is also a search bar, where you search anything through title.
        
 Backend :
        node.js, express.js, mongodb,javascript

Frontend : 
     Html,css,javascript
